w: so that I may rebuild it
they will grant me safe passage
And may I have a letter
After I had made an inspection
but we are powerless [to redeem them]
that they may be sold back
and required [of the nobles and officials] an oath that they
and I had set the doors
of those who had first returned
so that the people could understand
and they spent another quarter of the day
to them every corner of the land
But as soon as they had rest
these [were the ones] who sealed [the document]
we will let the fields lie fallow
had been put in charge of
Then I gathered the Levites and singers together
began to fall on the gates
in order to keep the Sabbath
and called down curses on them
Then I made them take an oath
Thus I purified [the priests and Levites]
